abstract: Xobni, a handy Microsoft Outlook plug-in, is adding Facebook information to its service; Zynga, the social gaming network, raised $29 million from Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers; iLike introduces a joint service on Facebook with Rhapsody.
snippet: Xobni, a handy Microsoft Outlook plug-in, is adding Facebook information to its service; Zynga, the social gaming network, raised $29 million from Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers; iLike introduces a joint service on Facebook with Rhapsody.
lead_paragraph: Here are a few Facebook-related announcements, as Mark Zuckerberg prepares to take the stage at his company’s annual developer conference in San Francisco.

headline.main: Facebook Conference Report: News From Xobni, Zynga and iLike
